name: Feed Eve
description:
This Game Attempts a lot of Next - Gen Features for VR. Check Minimum required PC specs.

Feed Eve is a horror/action VR game for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. The Early Access version includes 5 maps and two different game modes. On every map you are required to survive hellish waves of zombies to rank up your score, which will help you buy different weapons or doors to progress to the next map.
Maps have a range of different weaponry, up to 10 in certain maps.

- Manage your points wisely between buying weapons and escaping hellish scenarios.
- Utilize a vast array of weaponry to find your perfect fit.
- Desecrate realistic zombies in ultra realistic environments.

It's Feed Eve!
